document.title: The Impact of Electronic Reference on Reference Librarians
document.abstract: The growth in library patron use of electronic reference options has resulted in a larger number of searches and the retrieval of a larger amount of information. This trend has impacted reference librarians in three basic areas: work environment, instruction of users and the basic nature of reference work. Work environment changes include increased reference-desk business and more time spent on manual tasks such as hardware troubleshooting.
document.publication-title: School of Information Sciences -- Faculty Publications and Other Works
